name: The Fabulous Arrow
description:
"The Fabulous Arrow" is a marvelous infinite shooting experience.

Play as Maria, a bored archer that craves for a challenge and set up her own rules in a magical shooting range that makes targets move and avoid her arrows!

• The world-acclaimed mobile game, now enhanced with precise mouse controls and gorgeous HD graphics!
• An infinite shooter with progressive difficulty: wether you're a beginner or an expert you can have fun! Always aim for high scores though, because surprises await you...
• Unleash the power of the Fabulous Arrow! When you perform well, there aren't rules anymore and the only objective becomes to ravage the range with your arrows.
• 12 skins to earn! Bored of your classical look? Change your clothes, your arrow, the season, or even the targets' appearence! But everything has a price...
• 32 achievements to unlock! Whatever you do, you will always be rewarded with precious feathers, the currency in TFA's world. Can you unlock them all?
• A worldwide leaderboard! Can you be better than your fellow archers?
• Catchy soundtrack! "The Village Fest" is a medieval party tune that will stay in your head all day long!

What are you waiting for? Come and show us your skill!
